strapiPost.title: Moulin Rouge! The Musical Showing At Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.content:
Just in time for Valentine's Day, Moulin Rouge! The Musical takes the stage at Walton Arts Center tonight for the first of 14 performances from Feb 9-19.

  • Fresh take: The musical brings new life to the 2001 movie, remixing it with highlights from more than 160 years of music from Offenbach to Lady Gaga in an enchanting theatrical performance that celebrates truth, beauty, freedom, and love.
  • Upgrade: Enhance your Broadway experience by adding the VIP experience for $45 a person to enjoy heavy hors d'oeuvres, desserts, and a premium open bar before the show and at intermission.

Tickets start at $41 and can be purchased HERE.
